sentences.en: At home, I'd relive each encounter, writhing at the thought of my inadequacies.
sentences.cn: 回到家里, 我 总 要在脑海中重温与她每次相遇的情景, 一想到自己不善交际就深为苦恼.

sentences.en: Can I relive the errors of yesterday and right them?
sentences.cn: 是否我能重返昨日挽回犯下的错误?

sentences.en: Can relive the errors of yesterday and right them?
sentences.cn: 我怎么相信昨天是否正确?

sentences.en: Dementors force us to relive our very worst memories.
sentences.cn: 射魂兽让我们重现我们最可怕的记忆.

sentences.en: I can only relive the happiness and the innocence by memories.
sentences.cn: 菜只能通过回忆来回味当时的快乐和纯真.

sentences.en: I moved here last month to relive my memories.
sentences.cn: 我上个月搬到这里来寻回我的记忆.

sentences.en: I wish I could relive my childhood.
sentences.cn: 但愿我能重过孩提时代的生活.

sentences.en: Let move on to the glorious showcase of the immortals? as relive.
sentences.cn: 让进入光荣的窗口,为重新神仙 呢 ?

sentences.en: Let's enter the paper theatre and relive childhood memories from long ago.
sentences.cn: 华丽纸剧场舞台在此登场,让我们一起回忆过去童玩的乐趣.

sentences.en: May God grant you time to relive this moment in shame!
sentences.cn: 愿上帝让你承受此刻该尝到的羞耻!

sentences.en: Objective : To study the relive pain theory of Bidens bipinnata L.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究鬼针草镇痛作用机制.

sentences.en: The girls watch the tape, eager to relive their victory against UCLA.
sentences.cn: 女孩们观看录像带，急于重温打败加州大学洛杉矶分校队的胜利时刻。

sentences.en: Those who do not remember the past are condemned to relive it.
sentences.cn: 凡是忘掉过去的人注定要重蹈覆辙.

sentences.en: Time never moves in reverse, so we can never relive the past.
sentences.cn: 时光无法倒流, 我们都不可能回到昔时.

sentences.en: You can laugh again and again, relive those great moments.
sentences.cn: 你能一笑再笑, 重温那些美好时刻.

sentences.en: You can relive as often as you want.
sentences.cn: 你随时都可以重新体验.

trans.tran_cn: （在想像中）重新过…的生活，再经历
trans.tran_en: to remember or imagine something that happened in the past so clearly that you experience the same emotions again
